name.ja: <ruby>ＯＴＳ<rt>アウターバース</rt></ruby>レインペイル

summoning_condition.en: This card's name becomes "OuTerverSe" while in the Graveyard.

requirement.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This card becomes Galaxy Type until the end of this turn. Then, you can Fusion Summon an EARTH, WATER, FIRE, or WIND Attribute monster by sending monsters from your hand and/or field to the Graveyard as material. This turn, you can only attack with Galaxy Type monsters.
